event.title: «Let’s spark children’s interest in coding» at the Python Users Berlin meeting in Berlin, Germany

body.p: Matthias Kirschner will give a talk on how to spark children's interest in coding during the Python Users Berlin Meeting on 12 September. Matthias will share the readings of the illustrated book 'Ada & Zangemann' experiences and how you can contribute.
From 19:00 pm CEST in the CoUp coworking space
